parameters.name: filterArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the filter to describe.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the filter was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the filter was last updated.

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset group to which the filter belongs.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If the filter failed, the reason for its failure.

nested_items.name: filterExpression
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of item interactions to filter out of recommendation results. The filter expression must follow specific format rules. For information about filter expression structure and syntax, see Filter expressions.
